meanings.definition: To coat or treat with zinc.
meanings.sent1: I will zincify the metal to protect it from rusting.
meanings.sent2: The factory will zincify the pipes before installing them.
meanings.sent3: The wizard decided to zincify his staff to make it indestructible.
meanings.sent4: She hoped to zincify her friendship with trust and loyalty.
meanings.sent5: The artist used a special technique to zincify the sculpture for preservation.

meanings.definition: To become coated or treated with zinc.
meanings.sent1: Over time, the metal will zincify and develop a protective layer.
meanings.sent2: The old gate started to zincify after exposure to the elements.
meanings.sent3: The toy car magically zincified itself to become stronger in the game.
meanings.sent4: Her heart seemed to zincify with each kind gesture she received.
meanings.sent5: The garden gate seemed to zincify under the moonlight, gleaming softly.
